ygData.subject: AW: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
ygData.msgSnippet: at least you can try to get one, but i guess you will not be able to buy it cheap. i really do not think its trash, but hey, maybe you get lucky ;) its a very
ygData.messageBody:
at least you can try to get one, but i guess you will not be able to buy it
cheap. i really do not think its trash, but hey, maybe you get lucky ;)

its a very rare drop from what i have heared, so you will not see it
auctioned often. just try

tobi

-----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
Von: Umi-chan [mailto:mizu_no_miko@...]
Gesendet am: Freitag, 20. Juli 2001 09:30
An: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Betreff: Re: AW: [eqbards] Katanas

Trash or not, it's really the look I'm after, and that is better than
the one that drops in the warrens. Would rather have a nicer weapon,
though. But my bard is just an alt I'm playing for fun, not trying to be
best at anything, I just want her to be a fun character to play, good
looking, and fun for others to be with. But if it really is trash, does
that mean I could get my paws on one easily so I can get my little
bardie the katana look?

"Nygaardr, FC3" wrote:

> I think it is trash. 5dmg? That's pathetic. The haste is irrelevant
> as
> you can only have one haste item and one haste "spell" at any given
> time.
> 5dmg is dreadfully low and there is a limit as to how low, even with
> haste,
> the dly on a weapon can be. Max haste isnt that hard to get, and 5/24
> is
> rotten, jade mace 9/18 less than 10k on my server and I am sure lots
> cheaper
> on others. If you are just looking for the looks then maybe you will
> be
> happy with it. But as a weapon for anyone high enough to actually
> group and
> get it. You probably already have better.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Umi-chan [mailto:mizu_no_miko@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 9:05 AM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
>
>
> I'm going to ask, just because you said not to... how much for it? And
>
> how rare is it? Rare as is forget it, even if I get my cleric on a
> kael
> raid there's no f***ing chance she'd even be able to roll for it, or
> regular old trash weapon to be given to twinks?
>
> "Egelhof, Tobias" wrote:
>
> > velium swiftblade from kael ;) looks like a katana. stats are 1hs
> 5/24
> >
> > effect haste. dont ask for price =)
> >
> > tobi
> >
> >
> > -----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
> > Von: Umi-chan [mailto:mizu_no_miko@...]
> > Gesendet am: Donnerstag, 19. Juli 2001 10:15
> > An: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> > Betreff: [eqbards] Katanas
> > I just picked up a bronze katana in the Warrens, and I love the way
> it
> >
> > looks. Problem is, it's a really crappy weapon, so actually using it
>
> > isn't an option. Are there any other katanas out there that I could
> > get
> > myself? How much would they cost me, or how hard would they be to
> get
> > for myself as an 11 bard? (or a 35 cleric, though I'd rather not
> > twink)
> > I really would love to have the katana look without the shitty
> > damage/delay of the one I have.
> >
